value.title: A trusty robot to carry farms into the future

value.title: SAIC taps Chinese chip startup for self-driving cars
value.excerpt: SAIC is among a list of state-backed automotive majors shifting towards startup chipmaker Horizon Robotics as a domestic substitute for global suppliers.

value.title: EU report warns that AI makes autonomous vehicles ‘highly vulnerable’ to attack
value.excerpt: A European Union Agency for Cybersecurity report says machine learning should be considered part of the autonomous vehicle supply chain.

value.title: Continental picks up stake in AI chip start-up Recogni
value.excerpt: German technology company Continental has acquired a minority stake in the German-US start-up Recogni, which is working on a new chip architecture for object recognition in real-time based on artificial intelligence (AI).

value.title: Watch NASA’s Perseverance rover landing on Mars in HD
value.excerpt: NASA on Monday released stunning, high-definition footage of its car-sized rover landing on the Martian surface last week, the first-time that a spacecraft’s landing on Mars has been recorded in video.

value.title: Disrupting tech hiring: How AI connects companies to talent
value.excerpt: AI and big data technology are spearheading the evolution in recruitment technology -- taking hiring far beyond LinkedIn.

value.title: Wall Street’s Robots Are Taking on the Confusing World of Reddit
value.excerpt: Reddit forum WallStreetBets is hard for humans to follow at the best of times. But spare a thought for the machines. value.title: Bank of America earns most patents in its history in 2020 with a focus on AI and security

value.title: Cutting Through Confusion: The True Value Of AI For Sales Teams
value.excerpt: More top-performing sales reps are jumping ship. Over the last decade, the sales industry has witnessed rep tenure rapidly decline from 3 years in 2010 to a mere 1.5 years in 2019. This trend has only been expedited by the remote world forged by the Covid-19 pandemic.

value.title: Motional is now testing fully autonomous vehicles in Las Vegas
value.excerpt: Add Motional to the very short list of companies that have tested fully autonomous vehicles on public roads. The Hyundai-Aptiv joint venture announced that it has tested its vehicles without safety drivers behind the steering wheel on public streets in Las Vegas.

value.title: The real value of open source in the cloud
value.excerpt: It’s a mistake to believe that running open source in the cloud will protect you from vendor lock-in. But open source certainly offers freedom and independence to developers.
